languages.text: "Многие сочли бы твои высказывания об Экклезиархии еретическими".

traits.locale_text: "Многие сочли бы твои высказывания об Экклезиархии еретическими".

languages.text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."
languages.original_text: "Многие сочли бы твои высказывания об Экклезиархии еретическими".

traits.locale_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

languages.text: “很多人会把你对国教的看法视为异端言论。”
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: “很多人会把你对国教的看法视为异端言论。”

languages.text: «Más de uno consideraría heréticos sus comentarios sobre la Eclesiarquía».
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: «Más de uno consideraría heréticos sus comentarios sobre la Eclesiarquía».

languages.text: 「お前の帝国聖教会に対する発言を異端と捉える者も多くいるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の帝国聖教会に対する発言を異端と捉える者も多くいるだろう」

languages.text: "Viele würden Eure Anmerkungen zur Ekklesiarchie als ketzerisch betrachten."
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: "Viele würden Eure Anmerkungen zur Ekklesiarchie als ketzerisch betrachten."

languages.text: « Beaucoup qualifieraient vos propos sur l'Ecclésiarchie d'hérétique. »
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: « Beaucoup qualifieraient vos propos sur l'Ecclésiarchie d'hérétique. »

languages.text: "Birçokları, Ekleşiarşi hakkındaki yorumlarını kâfirlik olarak nitelerdi."
languages.original_text: "Many would consider your remarks about the Ecclesiarchy to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: "Birçok kişi Ekleşiarşi hakkında söylediklerini kâfirlik olarak nitelerdi."
